diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Mild acute pancreatitis, duodenal mass suspected of gastrointestinal stroma tumor (GIST), intrapancreatic mucinous neoplasm tail of the pancreas.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: CT A/P revealed a 4cm pancreatic head mass thought to be encasing the bowel, concerning for pancreatic cancer. MRCP showed a 5.1 x 4.4 x 3.7 cm heterogeneous mass centered over the duodenum displacing the pancreatic head along with a cystic structure in the tail of the pancreas suggestive of an intrapancreatic mucinous neoplasm.
